title: Google-Workspace-Mcp-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server to interact programmatically with Gmail and Google Calendar APIs, supporting email and calendar event management.
creator: epaproditus

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: OAuth Client ID for Google APIs

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: OAuth Client Secret for Google APIs

GOOGLE_REFRESH_TOKEN.description: OAuth Refresh Token for authenticating API requests
